name: Go-Go Gecko
description:
Arrow keys may be easier to use as movement on PC!

Grab walls hand over hand as you avoid dangerous obstacles and eat delicious flies in Go-Go Gecko! Play as a small gecko trying to scale to the top of immense heights while trying to gather flies along the way. 

In Go-Go Gecko players will get to experience engaging movement and difficult obstacles that will keep them wanting to reach even higher and higher!

  Featuring:

  • Three Exciting courses to traverse through
  • Thrilling swinging mechanics to get your little gecko to the top!
  • Dangerous spike balls stuck to the side of the walls that could kill you at any time
  • Dozens of flies to snack on along the way!
